title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree! This 2-in-1 cat condo and cat sisal scratching post is perfect for your furry friend. Made with high-quality 600g skin friendly plush and soft carpet, it provides a comfortable and safe space for your cat to relax and play.

The TSCOMON Cat Tree features a stable base design that ensures it won't tip or wobble, giving you peace of mind. It also has a unique leaves design that integrates beautifully with your home decor, adding a touch of greenery to your space.

With its large size, this cat tree provides ample space for kittens or one medium-sized cat to rest and play. The included scratching post made of sisal material will keep your cat's claws healthy and prevent them from scratching your furniture.

Assembly is a breeze with this cat tree. It can be easily put together in just three simple steps within 1 to 8 minutes. Plus, all the necessary tools are included in the package, making the process even easier.

At TSCOMON, we are committed to providing quality products and attentive service. Customer satisfaction is our greatest pursuit, and we are always available to assist you with any questions or concerns.

The dimensions of the cat tree are 11" x 15" x 41", making it a perfect fit for any room. It comes in three color options - Grey, Beige, and Green - allowing you to choose the one that best matches your home decor.

Weighing just 6 pounds, this cat tree is lightweight and easy to move around. The package includes 1× Cat Tree, 1× Assembly Instruction, and 1× Set of Tools, ensuring you have everything you need for a hassle-free setup.

Please note that it is important to check the size before buying the cat tree. For optimal stability, we recommend placing it on a flat floor against the wall. Finally, for the safety of your children, please do not allow them to play with the cat tree.

Upgrade your cat's playtime with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. Order yours today and give your furry friend the purr-fect space to relax and play!
